description:
http://anidb.net/ch114695 [Kouhei] splits up the group, designating http://anidb.net/ch111715 [Sakura] and http://anidb.net/ch111714 [Kotono] as leaders and announces the addition of two new members, http://anidb.net/ch111718 [Haruko] and http://anidb.net/ch111716 [Rei]. Sakura`s group struggles with Rei`s strict dance practice.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: 別の光 同じ気持ち
